title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and combine immediately with egg and cheese mixture.
Add pancetta and garlic, mix well, season with pepper, and serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until golden.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream, add cooked chicken, simmer 5 minutes, and serve hot.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables with soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Serve hot as a side or with rice/noodles.
